display_name: The Prophets’ Exclamation Point: "And Thus We See" in the Book of Mormon
description: The phrase, "thus we see," is used 24 times in the Book of Mormon: Mormon (17 times), Alma II (3), Nephi son of Lehi (2), Moroni II (1), and Antionah (1). Alma and Antionah use the phrase when discussing doctrinal issues, such as the fall of man, while Mormon, Nephi, and Moroni use it to draw lessons from historical events in the narratives.
